traits.name: Cognitive Tempo
traits.description: Speed of synthesis and preference for fast iteration vs slow deliberation.

traits.name: Abstraction Preference
traits.description: Preference for conceptual frameworks vs concrete specifics.

traits.name: Structure Need
traits.description: Need for planning, order, predictability, and clear constraints.

traits.name: Novelty Appetite
traits.description: Drive for new stimuli, exploration, and variety.

traits.name: Depth Orientation
traits.description: Tendency toward deep processing, intensity, and meaning-depth vs surface scanning.

traits.name: Emotional Signal Sensitivity
traits.description: Sensitivity to subtle emotional cues in self/others.

traits.name: Boundary Style
traits.description: Porous/merging vs firm/structured boundaries in relationships and work.

traits.name: Trust Threshold
traits.description: How quickly trust is granted and how strongly it is protected.

traits.name: Control Posture
traits.description: Preference for control, certainty, and risk containment vs openness to ambiguity.

traits.name: Risk Tolerance
traits.description: Comfort with uncertain outcomes and decision-making under volatility.

traits.name: Conflict Style
traits.description: Direct engagement vs avoidance vs repair-first approaches.

traits.name: Social Energy
traits.description: Recharge alone vs with people; preference for breadth vs depth of connection.

traits.name: Influence Style
traits.description: Persuasion through logic, warmth, presence, authority, or storytelling.

traits.name: Work Mode
traits.description: Preference for deep work, sprints, collaboration, or steady cadence.

traits.name: Quality Bar
traits.description: Tolerance for imperfect shipping vs high standards and refinement.

traits.name: Stress Activation
traits.description: Stress response intensity and activation level under pressure.

traits.name: Stress Direction
traits.description: Stress tends toward inward withdrawal vs outward action vs cognitive looping.

traits.name: Discipline Style
traits.description: Discipline via routine/structure vs inspiration/momentum.

traits.name: Security Orientation
traits.description: Drive for safety, stability, and protected downside.

traits.name: Growth Orientation
traits.description: Drive for expansion, development, and capability-building.

traits.name: Connection Orientation
traits.description: Drive for belonging, closeness, and relational harmony.

traits.name: Decision Style
traits.description: Analytical, intuitive, consultative, or decisive patterns.

traits.name: Learning Style
traits.description: Learn by reading, doing, teaching, or dialog.

traits.name: Time Horizon
traits.description: Short-term optimization vs long-term strategic orientation.
